content: @Lloyd McKenzie we discussed this here before, in the outline I made which status would the 'black box' service update when Adaptive Qs is done? Confirming it is the contained Q.status and not the QR.status since the client may not be done with it.
It would be the QR.status. The Q status should be "active" throughout. Once the engine deems the QR response to be complete, it would be complete...

OK ( I should have looked at the statuses for Q and QR first :-/)
ty
